review.title: “Good place to start for SME Auditing”
review.pros: Pros – a fast expanding audit firm that has recently started operations in Cambodia,expect alot of work with SME companies,Senior management is very competentvery wide variety of clients
review.cons: Cons – low renumeration in comparison with other audit firms such as the Big4sExposure limited to SME corporationsexpect long working hours with little OT
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – renumeration packages could be more attractive,allow for possibility of overseas placement or temporary overseas stint,start a structured internship program
